title: B-Trees & Indexing Techniques
subject: Database Management Systems
theory:
The standard index structure. 
**B+ Tree**: 
- All data pointers in leaves.
- Leaves are linked (Good for Range Query).
- Balanced Height (Search O(log n)).

interview_questions.question: Why B+ Tree over BST?
interview_questions.answer: B+ Tree has high branching factor (fan-out), keeping tree short to minimize Disk I/O. BST is too tall.
